shadow.name: FORGETTING
shadow.description: Repeating past mistakes, not learning from experience
shadow.thought_pattern: Why does this keep happening to me?

gift.name: MINDFULNESS
gift.thought_pattern: I learn from this. I don't repeat what doesn't serve.

siddhi.name: REVELATION
siddhi.description: Direct knowing, instant integration of wisdom
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Prophetic insight, seeing the pattern in all things
siddhi.somatic_signature: Immediate somatic knowing, no learning curve
siddhi.thought_pattern: I know. The pattern reveals itself instantly.

inversion_protocols.script: You keep repeating this because you're not integrating the lesson. Gate 33 is about storytellingâ€”taking experience and deriving meaning. When you don't reflect on what happened, you're doomed to repeat it. Stop rushing forward. Pause. What is this pattern teaching you?
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: When you notice a repeating pattern, stop. Journal: 'What am I meant to learn from this?' Extract the wisdom.

experiment.hypothesis: If I reflect on patterns and extract lessons for 14 days, repetition will decrease.
experiment.action: Daily: Review day. Identify patterns. Write: 'Today I learned...' Integrate the lesson consciously.

success_criteria.target: Breaking at least one cyclical pattern
